Title: AKA Smile
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Scott Reynolds (teleplay by), Melissa Rosenberg (teleplay by), Jamie King (story by), Scott Reynolds (story by), Jenna Reback (staff writer), Jamie King (staff writer)
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Mike Colter, Rachael Taylor, Eka Darville
Plot: Jessica and Luke get help from someone else in the neighborhood. Kilgrave gears up for a major test of powers against Jessica.
